verses.name: Amos 7:1
verses.text: Thus hath the Lord God shewed unto me; and, behold, he formed grasshoppers in the beginning of the shooting up of the latter growth; and, lo, it was the latter growth after the king’s mowings.

verses.name: Amos 7:2
verses.text: And it came to pass, that when they had made an end of eating the grass of the land, then I said, O Lord God, forgive, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise? for he is small.

verses.name: Amos 7:3
verses.text: The Lord repented for this: It shall not be, saith the Lord.
